additionalnotes.value: Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia. Round dose to nearest 2 mg. Recommend dosage reduction if CrCl 10 to 50 mL/minute: 75% of dose, CrCl less than 10 mL/minute: 50% of dose.
Hodgkin's Lymphoma. Maximum dose: 10 mg.Recommend dosage reduction if CrCl is 10 to 50 mL/minute: 75% of dose, CrCl less than 10 mL/minute: 50% of dose.

Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia. Treat until WBC is 10,000/mm3, interrupt treatment for 4 weeks. Then resume at 0.1 mg/kg/day. Recommend dosage reduction if CrCl10 to 50 mL/minute: 75% of dose, CrCl less than 10 mL/minute: 50% of dose.
Hodgkin Lymphoma. Treatment 4 to 8 weeks. Recommend dosage reduction if CrCl 10 to 50 mL/minute: 75% of dose, CrCl less than 10 mL/minute: 50% of dose.
